terms_and_conditions: Lastly, To ensure a safe and tailored experience, please let us know your age. Your response will help us provide the appropriate terms and conditions.
T&C: Please read the following Privacy Policy by scrolling all the way to the bottom to enable the
T&C_1: Pratham Education Foundation (Pratham) is one of India's largest NGOs, with its registered office in Mumbai Pratham has worked in the field of education for more than 25 years.
T&C_2: As you are aware, you are participating in the activities conducted by Pratham. In reference to this, Pratham, through its volunteers/representatives, shall collect your data which includes but is not limited to basic identification, location, contact information, learning related data, images/photographs, videos, voice recordings (the 'Materials'), while participating in the activities.
T&C_3: The collected information/materials shall be used in part or in whole for the following purposes:
T&C_4: 1. Program implementation & improvement, community engagement, and reporting purposes.
T&C_5: 2. In Pratham's publications, donor reports (in India as well as internationally), media activities, social media activities (e.g.: Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, Threads, etc.), activities on digital platforms (e.g.: Pratham's websites). The same shall be used for creating awareness about educational activities.
T&C_6: 3. To share with donors (in India as well as internationally) in order to create awareness about Pratham's charitable work.
T&C_7: You are requested to give your consent to collect, store and use the above-mentioned information/materials. However, as per your discretion, you can deny your consent for collecting your information/materials.
T&C_8: I grant consent to Pratham, its volunteers and/or representatives to use, store, share, publish the above-mentioned materials related to me without any coercion.
T&C_9: If at any point in time I decide that my data/photo/video should be removed, updated or rectified from Pratham's website or storage platforms, I shall inform Pratham's volunteer/representative via phone/email, which can be followed up by a written withdrawal/updation of consent. Thereafter, Pratham, its volunteers and/or representatives shall remove or rectify/update the same within 15 working days. In this regard, the contact details have been given below.
T&C_10: I have read and/or been explained in vernacular the foregoing and fully understand the contents of the terms hereof. I hereby confirm my consent for the above-mentioned terms of use of my materials/information and will not raise any claim whatsoever in regard to such usage.
office_adrress: Delhi Office: B4/59, Safdarjung Enclave, New Delhi-110029
T&C_12: I have read and agree to the Privacy Policy.and I consent to the collection and use of my personal data as described in the Consent Form.
T&C_13: You can request for data deletion, updating, or changes any time from the contact details provided in ‘Data & Privacy Center in the profile page.
something_went_wrong_try_again_later: Something went wrong, please try again later.
Update_your_preferences_to_get_the_best_: Update your preferences to get the best picks just for you!
assessment_note: Note: Your Pre-test will be considered only if you complete all the subjects.
assessment_instructions: Complete the tests for each of the subjects below. Feel free to do them in any order.
instruction1: Duration: The test is timed and will last for 20 minutes. Please manage your time accordingly.
instruction2: Number of Questions: The test comprises multiple-choice questions. Ensure you answer all questions within the given time frame.
instruction3: Submission: You can only submit the test once. Make sure you review your answers carefully before submitting, as you will not have another opportunity to submit.
instruction4: Starting the Test: Ensure you are in a quiet environment with no interruptions. Make sure your internet connection is stable.
instruction5: Navigating the Test: Read each question carefully before selecting your answer. You may skip questions and return to them later if needed, but keep an eye on the timer. Use the Next and Previous buttons to navigate between questions.
